usage0: [overlays] overlay# > xkb_code: the key to activate the overlay. 'disabled' to disable the overlay
usage1: [mapping] mapping works as follows: when 'key_code' is pressed, 'overlay_key' is generated
usage2: [mapped] you may also define a 'mapped_xkb_code' directly, which will be pressed instead of 'key_code'
usage3: [xkb_code] a list of xkb_codes and their current mappings will be available after first execution
usage4: [mode] if the overlay activation key should act in 'toggle' or 'hold' mode (RE-LOGIN required)
